questions.question: If the alarm had worked, what would the firefighters have done?
Which of these is a correct third conditional about missing a message?
options: If I checked my phone, I would have replied.
If I had checked my phone, I would have replied.
If I have checked my phone, I will reply.
If I check my phone, I would have replied.
questions.answer: If I had checked my phone, I would have replied.

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'If the teacher had explained it better, the students _____ confused.'
Which sentence uses third conditional with a negative verb?
options: If she had not forgotten her ID, she would have entered the club.
If she hasn't forgot her ID, she entered the club.
If she didn't forget her ID, she would entered the club.
If she not forgot her ID, she would enter the club.
questions.answer: If she had not forgotten her ID, she would have entered the club.
